title: Blended Learning Design and Knowledge-Based Learning Analytics Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen blended learning design competencies in social studies for in-service professionals. Requires mobile-based microlearning content creation and analytical tool utilization in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can select optimal learning activities by utilizing knowledge-based visualization tools when designing activities for blended learning environments.
Learners can interpret learner interaction data through learning analytics tools and apply insights to improve instructional design.
Learners can develop a weekly learning plan integrating social interaction and knowledge-construction activities on a mobile microlearning platform.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
